description: Thrivix Deployment Configuration - COPY TO deployment-config.json AND FILL IN YOUR VALUES

backend.comment: certificateArn: Optional ACM certificate ARN for HTTPS (e.g., arn:aws:acm:us-west-2:123456789012:certificate/xxx-xxx-xxx)

frontend.comment: bucketNameSuffix: Optional custom suffix for S3 bucket name. If null, uses AWS account ID

deployment.comment: autoUpdateFrontendWithBackendAlb: If true, frontend automatically uses backend ALB domain from CloudFormation exports
